verses.verse: As the <S%H354>deer<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> after the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks<s%>, so <S%H6165>pants<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> after <S%H430>you<s%>, O God.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%>, for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>: when shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?
My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have been my <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, while they <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, Where is your God?

When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> these <S%H8210>things<s%>, I pour out my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H5674>me<s%>: for I had gone with the <S%H5519>multitude<s%>, I <S%H1718>went<s%> with them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise<s%>, with a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> that kept <S%H2287>holyday<s%>.

Why are you cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in <S%H3176>me<s%>? hope you in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> him for the <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>favor<s%>.

O my <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is cast <S%H7817>down<s%> inside <S%H2142>me<s%>: therefore will I remember you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and of the <S%H2769>Hermonites<s%>, from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar<s%>.

<S%H8415>Deep<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> unto <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of your <S%H6794>waterspouts<s%>: all your <S%H4867>waves<s%> and your <S%H1530>billows<s%> are gone over <S%H5674>me<s%>.

Yet the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be with <S%H8605>me<s%>, and my prayer unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>.

I will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, Why have you <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3212>me<s%>? why go I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?
As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, my <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>; while they say <S%H3117>daily<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, Where is your God?

Why are you cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> inside <S%H3176>me<s%>? hope you in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3444>him<s%>, who is the health of my <S%H6440>favor<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
